articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Nehra's honest take on India star after 3rd AUS T20I: ‘No doubt that Gaikwad…' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ashish Nehra has issued a noteworthy statement about an in-form Ruturaj Gaikwad after the 3rd T20I between India and Australia. | Cricket
articles.content: Opener Ruturaj Gaikwad was unlucky to be on the receiving end in an encounter where he became the first-ever Indian batter to score a T20I century against Australia. Glenn Maxwell's brilliant century… [+2540 chars]
